message: So I may skip doing a Pyramid Lightning Talk tomorrow, but I'd be happy to do an Openspace to help people get started using Pyramid. If anyone is interested let me know and I'll dig up a time slot tomorrow.
I'd attend. I need to see what the upgrade looks like for 1.1. I can also help out some users.
Great, I'll check the schedule. Any talks you guys specifically want to go to so I can avoid their time?
I'm hoping to attend Procedures, Objects, Reusability at 1:30 and Python, Parsing and You at 2:30 ... I'm free other than that.
Added it to the board at 3:30, though after goofing and writing it at 4:30. >.>
